alert.note: Alert for Towns; Union; White (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 03 at 7:45PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Towns, White and east central Union Counties through 815 PM EDT... At 745 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over Leaf, or near Cleveland, moving north at 15 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Cleveland, Helen, Unicoi State Park, Robertstown, Blue Mountain Shelter, Brasstown Bald, Mountain Scene, Low Gap Shelter, Track Rock, Anna Ruby Falls, Leaf, Smithgall Woods Conservation Are, Sautee and Qualatchee Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
